# JointTransforms.ArrayLiteralElement

**Type Alias**

The type of the elements of an array literal.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ArrayLiteralElement = Transform
```

## Identifying joint transforms

- **JointTransforms.Element**: An individual joint transform in the collection.
- **JointTransforms.Index**: A position of an individual joint transform in the collection.
